name: Warm Potato
description:
A fire sorcerer potato gets home after a long day out in the cold, and we think she deserves a cozy night in. You must help her control her fire powers in order to make dinner, stay warm and have a very comfy end of day.

This is a time management point and click game in which you need to control the lighting, the fireplace and the stove all at the same time.

Made for ludum dare 46 using the keep it alive theme. 

This game was made by:

Programmers Aline Kaiper and Henrique de Lima, artist Luiza Muller, and musician Airton Junior
